elements.title: the Farseer Trilogy
elements.contents: ... that the Farseer Trilogy was written under an androgynous pen name, Robin Hobb (pictured)?

elements.title: Wenn das Brot, das wir teilen
elements.contents: ... that "Wenn das Brot, das wir teilen" (When the bread that we share), a hymn written in 1981, begins with a reference to the Miracle of the Roses?

elements.title: Jean Walton
elements.contents: ... that Jean Walton stopped the Pomona College football team from forcibly weighing and measuring the proportions of first-year women?

elements.title: Ruby Tower
elements.contents: ... that the 1968 Ruby Tower collapse was caused by an earthquake centered more than 200 km (120 mi) away?

elements.title: Kobe Shoji
elements.contents: ... that Kobe Shoji escaped 120 °F (49 °C) heat at the Poston Internment Camp by enlisting in the U.S. Army's 442nd Infantry Regiment?

elements.title: Crab Game
elements.contents: ... that a bug in Crab Game caused multiple IP addresses to be leaked?

elements.title: Meadow Walker
elements.contents: ... that Meadow Walker was walked down the aisle by Vin Diesel?

elements.title: the number of people who shake an odd number of other people's hands is even
elements.contents: ... that whenever some of the people in a party shake hands, the number of people who shake an odd number of other people's hands is even?
